::DrillBit::

"We should do this over visual communication. All of us. I dont want us
getting there and being stabed in the back."

::Dollon::

He drinked to the toasts, being rather quiet.

::Hot Rod::

"Yes, I do," he said walking closer to her.
"You are buetiful. Anyway when I left the Alliance I left you high and
dry. I just wanted to talk things out. You seemed really pissed when I
saw you after that."

::Epyon::

"Ok, patch Condor's message to my comm link."

::Demoliton::

He follows the others.
